DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the influence of different propofol formulations(plain or with lidocaine)on anesthetic induction. Propofol plain or with lidocaine is administered using a closed-loop algorithm in order to reach a Bispectral Index target of 50.
DOC.criteria: patients scheduled for an intravenous induction of anesthesia with propofol Age under 18 Pregnancy or breastfeeding Allergy to propofol, soya or peanuts, Allergy to lidocaine, History of central neurological disorder or brain injury, Patients receiving psychotropic drugs, Patient with a pacemaker.
